column4: hey guys I have big problem with NVIDIA Drivers... I go with this tut http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=9769396&postcount=2 but after restart GDM didn't start
and what's wrong w/ the packaged nvidia driver that you don't use that?
read again, I think I made myself clear enough
'sudo nvidia-installer --uninstall' (if you already ran the binary script) '&& sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install nvidia-current && sudo nvidia-xconfig', then reboot
I will have if I restore Xorg then I will have... With netbook
then run only 'sudo nvidia-installer --uninstall', it should revert you to the nouveau driver
and don't forget to un-blacklist the nouveau driver
and possibly some of the fb drivers too, no idea which one
I uninstall driver and now nothing shows up
did you a) make sure you deleted /etc/X11/xorg.conf, and b) un-blacklist nouveau?
I did not do any of it because no1 say "do it"... damn
it's like "and remember do backup your data befor any actions" at the end of tutorial
